Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Carlos Delgado
Dear Sir,
Carlos Delgado has nothing more to prove at AA Hagerstown Suns!
He has an AVG of .353 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
